title: Ep - 159 - SHANGELA FROM RUPAUL’S DRAG RACE / PETER FROM VANDERPUMP RULES
description:
Actor and performer D.J. “Shangela” Pierce is best recognized as the only contestant to compete on three separate seasons of the Emmy-award winning reality series “RuPaul’s Drag Race” (seasons 2, 3 and All Stars 3). In 2018, Shangela starred in the critically acclaimed film “A Star Is Born” opposite Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper. Shangela discusses her meteoric rise to fame, the impact of Drag Race on mainstream culture, her bond with Lady Gaga, and more. 


Peter Madrigal is the manager of SUR, the setting for Bravo’s mega-hit Vanderpump Rules. Kate asks him to review this week’s episode and explain his reasoning for attending James and Raquel’s puppy shower. 


Kate asks Joey, a Chippendales dancer, to review this week’s episode of Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
